task_info.description: Contact form issue and Typeform replacement

task_description:
Hi team, this is Karin. I just spoke with the client and her contact form is not sending responses.

Please pull all contact form responses from the last few months and export them so we can send them to her.

Also, please update the contact form on this page to use Typeform instead:
https://thelawdog.com/contact/
task_comments:
@Harsh Trivedi

As requested, we've completed the following tasks:

Exported Contact Form Entries
We've exported all entries from the 2025 contact form. The exported file is attached for reference.

Updated Contact Form
A Typeform has been created and the existing contact form on the website has been replaced with Typeform.
Page URL: https://thelawdog.com/contact/

The Typeform is available in the Typeform dashboard with the following details:
Name: The Law Dog | Contact Form
Link: https://admin.typeform.com/form/ouDPx9lI/create

Testing
The form was tested using a whitelabel email.
Email notifications are set to: info@thelawdog.com

Screen recording for reference:
https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fi/we65ci071u7vioupqx2n4/the-loaw-dog-recording.webm?rlkey=bvb2t8lhuoahb5xs02hcz5xca&st=i4b1nxvr&dl=0
